internal partial class StarWarsSchema
{
    private class HumanInputGraphType : global::GraphQL.Types.Aot.AotAutoRegisteringInputObjectGraphType<global::GraphQL.StarWars.TypeFirst.Types.HumanInput>
    {
        private readonly global::System.Reflection.MemberInfo[] _members;
        private readonly global::GraphQL.Types.FieldType[] _fields;

        public HumanInputGraphType()
        {
            _members = [
                typeof(global::GraphQL.StarWars.TypeFirst.Types.HumanInput).GetProperty(nameof(global::GraphQL.StarWars.TypeFirst.Types.HumanInput.Name))!,
                typeof(global::GraphQL.StarWars.TypeFirst.Types.HumanInput).GetProperty(nameof(global::GraphQL.StarWars.TypeFirst.Types.HumanInput.HomePlanet))!
            ];
            _fields = global::System.Linq.Enumerable.ToArray(ProvideFields());
            foreach (var fieldType in _fields)
            {
                AddField(fieldType);
            }
        }

        protected override global::System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<global::System.Reflection.MemberInfo> GetRegisteredMembers() => _members;

        public override object ParseDictionary(global::System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary<string, object?> value, global::GraphQL.IValueConverter valueConverter)
        {
            return new global::GraphQL.StarWars.TypeFirst.Types.HumanInput
            {
                Name = ParseField<string>(_fields[0]),
                HomePlanet = ParseField<string>(_fields[1])
            };

            TFieldType ParseField<TFieldType>(global::GraphQL.Types.FieldType fieldType)
            {
                if (value.TryGetValue(fieldType.Name, out var fieldValue))
                {
                    return (TFieldType)global::GraphQL.ValueConverterExtensions.GetPropertyValue(valueConverter, fieldValue, typeof(TFieldType), fieldType.ResolvedType!)!;
                }
                return default!;
            }
        }

        public override bool IsValidDefault(object value)
        {
            if (value is not global::GraphQL.StarWars.TypeFirst.Types.HumanInput obj)
                return false;

            if (global::GraphQL.GraphQLExtensions.IsValidDefault(_fields[0].ResolvedType!, obj.Name))
                return false;
            if (global::GraphQL.GraphQLExtensions.IsValidDefault(_fields[1].ResolvedType!, obj.HomePlanet))
                return false;

            return true;
        }

        public override global::GraphQLParser.AST.GraphQLValue ToAST(object? value)
        {
            if (value == null)
                return new global::GraphQLParser.AST.GraphQLNullValue();

            if (value is not global::GraphQL.StarWars.TypeFirst.Types.HumanInput obj)
                return null!; //allowed return to indicate failure

            var objectValue = new global::GraphQLParser.AST.GraphQLObjectValue
            {
                Fields = new(_fields.Length)
            };

            ProcessField(_fields[0], obj.Name);
            ProcessField(_fields[1], obj.HomePlanet);

            return objectValue;

            void ProcessField(global::GraphQL.Types.FieldType fieldType, object? fieldValue)
            {
                var ast = global::GraphQL.GraphQLExtensions.ToAST(fieldType.ResolvedType!, fieldValue)
                    ?? throw new global::System.InvalidOperationException($"Could not convert value in global::GraphQL.StarWars.TypeFirst.Types.HumanInput.{fieldType.Name} to AST");
                if (ast is not global::GraphQLParser.AST.GraphQLNullValue || fieldType.DefaultValue != null)
                    objectValue.Fields.Add(new(new(fieldType.Name), ast));
            }
        }
    }
}

        protected override global::System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<global::System.Reflection.MemberInfo> GetRegisteredMembers() => _members.Keys;
        protected override void BuildFieldType(global::GraphQL.Types.FieldType fieldType, global::System.Reflection.MemberInfo memberInfo)
        {
            _members[memberInfo](fieldType, memberInfo);
        }

        public void ConstructField0_HeroAsync(global::GraphQL.Types.FieldType fieldType, global::System.Reflection.MemberInfo memberInfo)
